abstract: At Allen & Company’s so-called summer camp for moguls, Timothy D. Cook’s presence was noticed, particularly as Steve Jobs had usually been a no-show.
snippet: At Allen & Company’s so-called summer camp for moguls, Timothy D. Cook’s presence was noticed, particularly as Steve Jobs had usually been a no-show.
lead_paragraph: SUN VALLEY, Idaho — There’s plenty of wattage at Allen & Company’s so-called summer camp for moguls this year.

headline.main: Amid the Moguls, Apple’s Cook Stands Out
